name: pyprismatic
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: pyprismatic
    version: 1.2.1

    sha256: 844f659575dd98999b7c4864e850a7ec735f297ab1fb6c2d2be91d7f9720fe70
    url: https://github.com/prism-em/prismatic/archive/1.2.1.tar.gz
build:
    number: 7
    script: bash ${RECIPE_DIR}/build_pyprismatic.sh
    string: cpu_py36h2558ff0_7

        - xz 5.2.5 h0b31af3_0
        - zlib 1.2.11 h0b31af3_1006
    host:
        - boost 1.72.0 py36hbf1eeb5_0
        - boost-cpp 1.72.0 hef959ae_1
        - bzip2 1.0.8 h0b31af3_2
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - certifi 2020.6.20 py36h9f0ad1d_0
        - fftw 3.3.8 nompi_h44ae4c8_1111

        - hdf5 1.10.6 nompi_h3e39495_100

    commands:
        - python -c "import pyprismatic; pyprismatic.demo()"

extra:
